analysis_general: "Attractive and competitive salary" - vague salary specifications have been shown to decrease diversity in the candidate pool.
text: :  . ,  . A Lobby Hostess provides service for Guests to contribute to an overall exceptional experience from check-in through check-out and complete audits, as required. A Lobby Hostess contributes to the first impression of our Guests and, therefore, must perform the following tasks to the highest standards: -Meeting, greeting and escorting guests to the table, serving the menu. -Providing effective and cultural services to guests of a restaurant, bar, banquet hall and creating comfortable conditions for them. -Informing the guest about ongoing promotions and events held in the hotel restaurant and bar. -Ensuring cleanliness and order in the hall, at the workplace and storage facilities. -Work with complaints and complaints of guests. Requirements: Fluent Uzbek/Russian and English. Other language would be beneficial. Excellent communication skills. Ability to work under pressure. Restaurant greeter experience preferred. Working conditions: -Attractive and competitive salary. -Full-time employment, according to the schedule. -Personal and professional development opportunities. -Convenient office location. ,   , 4.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::614a6f8b5a37b16142effa5d::headhunter_uz", "source": "headhunter_uz", "country": "UZ", "company": "Hilton Tashkent City Hotel", "position": "Lobby Hostess", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, полный день

A Lobby Hostess provides service for Guests to contribute to an overall exceptional experience from check-in through check-out and complete audits, as required. A Lobby Hostess contributes to the first impression of our Guests and, therefore, must perform the following tasks to the highest standards:

-Meeting, greeting and escorting guests to the table, serving the menu;

-Providing effective and cultural services to guests of a restaurant, bar, banquet hall and creating comfortable conditions for them;

-Informing the guest about ongoing promotions and events held in the hotel restaurant and bar;

-Ensuring cleanliness and order in the hall, at the workplace and storage facilities;

-Work with complaints and complaints of guests;

Requirements:

  • Fluent Uzbek/Russian and English. Other language would be beneficial;
  • Excellent communication skills;
  • Ability to work under pressure;
  • Restaurant greeter experience preferred;

Working conditions:

-Attractive and competitive salary;

-Full-time employment, according to the schedule;

-Personal and professional development opportunities

-Convenient office location.

Ключевые навыки

Английский язык
Администрирование
Прием и распределение звонков

Адрес

Ташкент, улица Ислама Каримова, 4
Показать на большой карте
"}
